effect.name: Scale3x BG
effect.description: Upscale the screen to a higher resolution using a modified Scale3x upscaling algorithm. This version samples the background rather than the current layer. Special thanks to Salamanderpants for sponsorship.
effect.author: Sebastian Janisz
